Html: Is there any way to put a DropdownBox or other controls on Contextual tab? I knew a label can appear on Contextual tab.

Do you mean to put a control on the ContextualTab header, in place of or next to the label?  You should be able to do this by retemplating the ContextualTab header, however, I have a feeling that this might be in violation of the Office Licensing Guidelines.  I would email the Office Licensing team (officeui@microsoft.com) to clarify if this is allowed or not before going through the trouble of doing the work to enable this.

Thanks!
Samantha
